title: Stock Futures Waver on Ukraine Concerns
sub_head: Russian stocks fell the day after the Moscow exchange partially reopened
body:
U.S. stock futures wobbled Friday as investors gauged the Ukraine war’s impact on commodity prices and inflation.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 wavered between small gains and losses, indicating that the broad-market index could hover after it closed up 1.4% on Wednesday. Nasdaq-100 futures were also mostly flat, suggesting that technology stocks may hold on to the previous day’s gains after the opening bell.
